JBoss Operations Network 2.4 uses plug-ins to support all of its resource types. Each platform that can be monitored, configured, and managed through JBoss ON has a corresponding agent plug-in that enables JBoss ON to manage it. the list products and projects. Other platforms, servers, and applications can be monitored through JBoss ON by writing custom plug-ins to allow JBoss ON to detect and control them. For more information on writing agent plug-ins, see the 1.9.4. Process Service 1.9.3. Network Adapter Service 1.9.2. File System Service
